actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that a widow's or widower's insurance benefit equal to 100 percent of the deceased worker's primary insurance amount shall be payable at age 62 rather than only at age 65.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that a widow's or widower's insurance benefit shall be equal to 100 percent of the deceased worker's primary insurance amount under title II (Old-Age, Survivors', and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act at age 62 rather than only at age 65.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that a widow's or widower's insurance benefit equal to 100 percent of the deceased worker's primary insurance amount shall be payable at age 62 rather than only at age 65.
